grey night80:

Thank you! Ugh… The source is very glitchy… >.< Ah well, thanks again for the help.

Just find a better client, and change the IP on it.

Change the 127.0.0.1s to your no-ip…127.0.0.1 is localhost(if you didnt know)

item.title: How do I add my no-ip to the client?
item.dc:creator: @grey_night80 grey night80
item.description:
@grey_night80 wrote:

Hey everyone. I am a beginner programmer, so I wanted to find an easy client to edit. This is the one that I am trying to use: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=BEHZBMKB.

It comes with a source and a client. I know that I am supposed to go into the GUI folder to change the no-ip that was originally there to my own. Well, there is only a EGUI folder, and this is what’s in it:

[code]import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Cursor;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import javax.swing.*;

public class EGUI
{
public static void main(String args[])
{
client.main(new String[] {
“127.0.0.1”, “127.0.0.1”, “127.0.0.1”
});
}
}
[/code]

Where do I put my ip in?

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add my no-ip to the client?
